problem_text_en: Given X is the midpoint of UW. X is the midpoint of TV and UW . Complete the proof that TU∥VW . (Elements:  ∠VXW ,  VX ,  UX ,  WX ,  ∠VWX ,  TU ,  ∠TXU ,  △TUX ,  ∠TUX ,  △VWX ,  VW ,  TX , )
raw_statement: X is the midpoint of TV
X is the midpoint of UW
raw_reason: Converse of Alternate Interior Angles Theorem
